transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan ji sir matlab yahi keh rahe hain na bas galti se click ho gaya tha as such koi matlab subscription related to koi issue nahi hai na aapko.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi usse koi issue nahi.
Executive: Chalo jo kal maine buylead vagera bheji thi wo aapne consume kari?
Customer: Haan kuch kiye the.
Executive: To kuch response mila unse phir?
Customer: Response to kuch bola aage piche baat karenge bol ke bola hai.
Customer: Number umber le liya sab uske baad dekhte hain.
Executive: Achha matlab koi baat karenge bol rahe hain koi tension nahi hai.
Customer: Baat karna padega.
Executive: Baat matlab abhi aapne consume kari hai call nahi kari abhi clients ko?
Customer: Ab wo kal jo baat hogi usse baat ho gaya nahi to ab ek do din ka samay mangta hai tab uske baad me kuch baat hoga.
Executive: Achha matlab ye baat karne se hi pata lag jata hai na wo to positive response hai ya nahi hai.
Customer: Haan bol raha hai do char din panch din baad kaam hai aisa aisa wo log bolta hai aisa.
Executive: Achha achha.
Executive: To buylead vagera main abhi aapko aaj bhi share kar dungi aap wo bhi ek matlab consume karna balance hoga na abhi buylead ka aapke paas.
Customer: Haan hoga hoga.
Executive: Aur sir uske baad number to yani ki kal kya kuch number tha na ki wo to uthaya nahi ek do tho aur ek do tho number yani switch off tha.
Executive: Achha ek do uthaya nahi uthaya nahi ek do switch off tha sir is case me na aap ye kara karo ki unko jaise message kar diya unke whatsapp pe kar diya ya lead manager se direct message kar diya kai baar ho jata hai ki bhai contact nahi ho pata hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To us case me ye hai aap message drop kar diya karo unko ya to whatsapp pe unke ya phir lead manager pe aap apni jo hai catalog ka link share kar do unko isse ki wo revert kare check kare.
Customer: Chaliye theek hai na jaisa rehta hai phir hum aapse baat karte hain.
Executive: Haan waise jo direct calls vagera check kar lenge hum theek hai.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain sir?
Customer: Aap whatsapp kariye na hum check kar lenge jo hoga baat hone se hum kar lenge wo wo theek hai mere ko bas ye hai ki bhai jo direct calls aa rahi hai na aapke paas dekho pehle aapke paas 60 60 call aati thi direct aur abhi jo hai wo band kam ho gayi hai matlab 20 30 itni aa pa rahi hai kyuki wahi hai ki bhai call maine aapko pehle hi bola tha call answer rate thoda kam hai aapki side se.
Customer: Chaliye theek hai na aisa ke liye sab samay ka baat.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain?
Customer: Wo time nahi ho pata is chalte nahi ho pata hai.
Executive: Wo to sir main samajh rahi hu aap jaise shift bhi kar rahe hain to us samay nahi ho pata hai aap single hi hai jo handle karte hain proper company ko but wahi hai ki bhai thoda sa direct agar buyers connect kar rahe hain to unse to baat hum direct kar sakte hain kyuki unme to bas unko ek query hoti hai.
Customer: Direct connect rehta hai to aise hum kar lenge matlab nahi ho pata hai kabhi kya kariye.
Executive: Haan ho baat to theek hai par kya rehta hai na ye aapka.
Customer: Teen char do ka hum baat karte hain aapse.
Executive: Haan theek hai bas mere ko ek cheez ye bataye ye jo manish ko kisi se baat ki koi deal hui hai kya TMT bar ki?
Customer: Haan Jharkhand se deal ho raha hai usse ho gaya hai samajhiye.
Executive: Ho gaya hai matlab ki deal convert ho gayi unke sath?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Kyuki kya hai na unhone aapki profile pe jo hai ek star ki rating di hai TMT bars jo unhone bhi purchase ki hai wahi main puch rahi hu unhone purchase ki hai ya sirf baat kari thi abhi.
Customer: Theek hai hum phir se baat karte hain aapse thoda der me haan.
Executive: Haan theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received low direct calls.

- Some buyleads numbers were switched off.

- Customer received 1-star rating on profile.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested messaging on WhatsApp/lead manager.

- Executive offered to share catalog link.

- Executive confirmed deal with Manish for TMT bar.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, direct calls, catalog, tmt bar, rating
